overview: This movie is a celebration of very sexy and very strong women. It focuses on the professional and private lives of the lawyers and other employees of the very prestigious law firm Lesbian Legal. These lesbians are hot, horny, legal and ready for drama. These young girls have waited for years to be legal and now they're ready to share themselves with the ones who love them. Will they get heart-broken? Will they fall in love and stay there forever?
title: Lesbian Legal 15
